channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reddit now supports translation of posts and comments to Hindi

item.description: Veterans of the European startup scene, who’ve launched multiple consumer apps in the past, are partly coming out of stealth Tuesday with a new app. O...

item.title: 15% Off Wayfair Promo Code | April 2025 Coupons

item.title: As Measles Cases Surge, Mexico Issues a US Travel Alert
item.description: The border state of Chihuahua has recorded 713 confirmed cases, with its outbreak linked to the ongoing cluster of cases north of the border in Texas.

item.title: IXI raises $36.5M from Amazon and others to bring autofocus to prescription glasses

item.title: 20% Off DoorDash Promo Code | April 2025
item.description: Explore top DoorDash promo codes for 20% off, free delivery, and up to 30% off local restaurants in April 2025.

item.title: Top KitchenAid Promo Codes and Coupons
item.description: Get 50% off select appliances, 15% off most regular-price items, free delivery, and other great savings today on WIRED.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Will Widen the Digital Divide

item.title: Government hackers are leading the use of attributed zero-days, Google says
item.description: Governments like China and North Korea, along with spyware makers, used the most recorded zero-days in 2024.
